LanguageData.StuffEffectMultiplierArmor.label: Armor - Material effect multiplier
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Sharp.label: Armor - Sharp
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Sharp.description:
The chance to affect sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, explosions, and animal bites.

Upon taking damage, first this armor rating is reduced by the attack's armor penetration value. The remaining armor rating is then compared against a random number from 0 to 100.

 -If the random number is under half the armor rating, the damage deflects harmlessly.
 -If the random number is over half the armor rating, but not higher than the armor rating, the damage is mitigated. This means it is converted into blunt damage and reduced by half.
 -If the random number is greater than the armor rating, the armor has no effect.

For example, at 90% armor rating against an attack with 10% armor penetration, there is a 40% chance of deflecting the attack harmlessly, and a 40% chance of mitigating the damage.

In the case of apparel armor, each layer of apparel applies its armor to the attack separately, from the outside in.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Blunt.label: Armor - Blunt
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Blunt.description:
The chance to affect blunt damage like fists, club impacts and rock falls.

Upon taking damage, first this armor rating is reduced by the attack's armor penetration value. The remaining armor rating is then compared against a random number from 0 to 100.

 -If the random number is under half the armor rating, the damage deflects harmlessly.
 -If the random number is over half the armor rating, but not higher than the armor rating, the damage is mitigated. This means it is reduced by half.
 -If the random number is greater than the armor rating, the armor has no effect.

For example, at 90% armor rating against an attack with 10% armor penetration, there is a 40% chance of deflecting the attack harmlessly, and a 40% chance of mitigating the damage.

In the case of apparel armor, each layer of apparel applies its armor to the attack separately, from the outside in.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Heat.label: Armor - Heat
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Heat.description:
The chance to affect temperature-related damage like burns.

Upon taking damage, first this armor rating is reduced by the attack's armor penetration value. The remaining armor rating is then compared against a random number from 0 to 100.

 -If the random number is under half the armor rating, the damage deflects harmlessly.
 -If the random number is over half the armor rating, but not higher than the armor rating, the damage is mitigated. This means it is reduced by half.
 -If the random number is greater than the armor rating, the armor has no effect.

For example, at 90% armor rating against an attack with 10% armor penetration, there is a 40% chance of deflecting the attack harmlessly, and a 40% chance of mitigating the damage.

In the case of apparel armor, each layer of apparel applies its armor to the attack separately, from the outside in.
LanguageData.Insulation_Cold.label: Insulation - Cold
LanguageData.Insulation_Cold.description: How much this apparel improves a wearer's minimum comfortable temperature. Greater values allow surviving in colder temperatures.
LanguageData.Insulation_Heat.label: Insulation - Heat
LanguageData.Insulation_Heat.description: How much this apparel improves a wearer's maximum comfortable temperature. Greater values allow surviving in warmer temperatures.
LanguageData.EnergyShieldEnergyMax.label: Energi max perisai
LanguageData.EnergyShieldEnergyMax.description: Energi maksimum yang dapat dimiliki sabuk perisai. Semakin banyak energi semakin banyak damage terserap.
LanguageData.EnergyShieldRechargeRate.label: Shield recharge rate
LanguageData.EnergyShieldRechargeRate.description: The rate at which a shield gains energy as long as it is not broken.
LanguageData.SmokepopBeltRadius.label: Radius lingkaran sabuk smokepop
LanguageData.SmokepopBeltRadius.description: Area yang tertutup oleh asap ketika sabuk smokepop meledak.
LanguageData.EquipDelay.label: equip delay
LanguageData.EquipDelay.description: Waktu yang dibutuhkan untuk memakai dan melepas barang ini.
